Package ca.phon.ui.text

Class SearchField

java.lang.Object
java.awt.Component
java.awt.Container
javax.swing.JComponent
javax.swing.JPanel
ca.phon.ui.text.SearchField
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
Direct Known Subclasses:
IpaMapSearchField, TableSearchField
public class SearchField
extends javax.swing.JPanel
A search field with optional context button. The field displayes a prompt when the text field text is empty.
See Also:
Serialized Form

      public void onShowContextMenu​(PhonActionEvent pae)
      Displays the context menu for the component. By default, this displays a single option for clearing the text field. Subclasses should override to define custom options.
